blocks.text: If the quit menu is not working, it's not a hack its just a underlying bug. You will have to use task manager to close it if that happens. The music may continue to play for a min (seems to auto close after a min or so) after that or until you close the Vuplex task manager process (this is the built in browser). I am trying to figure out a fix.
Fixed a bug with the second browser window not stopping its videos when top right clicked.
Small update with a fix for when the window changes size from some outside code. Same download link.
